item.title: My first script. (Autotalker)
item.dc:creator: @junkj junkj
item.description:
@junkj wrote:

program Autotalker;

const
Howmanytimestosay=1;    //how many times to say
yourmessage = 'Selling Rune W/C Axe'; //Please type what you are buying or selling
Price = '20k'; //Please type how much you want to buy or sell.
Username = 'Iwantbananas'; //Please type your username so people know who to trade
Color = 'flash1:'; //Type your color.  Make sure there is a : after the color
Effect = 'scroll:'; // type your text effect. Make sure there is a :

var
times: Integer;

Procedure Talking;
begin
  wait(1000)
  sendkeys(Color + Effect + yourmessage + Price + Username + chr(13));
  times :=Howmanytimestosay + 1;
  wait(random(500)+200);
  end;

Begin
ActivateClient;
    Repeat
      Talking;
  Until(Howmanytimestosay=Howmanytimestosay)
End.

the var is wrong you need a howmanytosay in your const then put

times:=Howmanytimestosay+1

And in your main loop the until needs to be

until(Howmanytimestosay=Howmanytimestosay)

Thats all i found wrong, good luck scripting.

And you need a shift keys function ron had it somewhere it these forums…
I think it was an autotalker by secet.
put the function after the begin and before the talking thing.

Read full topic

item.title: My first script. (Autotalker)
item.dc:creator: @Temetnosce311 Temetnosce311
item.description:
@Temetnosce311 wrote:

This is used to Buy or sell items. I’ve been using SCAR for a bit now, so I have looked through some scripts.

[code]program Autotalker;
const
yourmessage = ‘Selling Rune W/C Axe’; //Please type what you are buying or selling
Price = ‘20k’; //Please type how much you want to buy or sell.
Username = ‘Iwantbananas’; //Please type your username so people know who to trade
Color = ‘flash1:’; //Type your color. Make sure there is a : after the color
Effect = ‘scroll:’; // type your text effect. Make sure there is a :

var
times: Integer;

Procedure Talking;
begin
wait(1000)
sendtext(Color + Effect + yourmessage + Price + Username + chr(13));
times :=times + 1;
wait(random(500)+200);
end;

Begin
ActivateClient;
Repeat
Talking;
Until(isfkeydown(10))
End.[/code]

Read full topic
